title: Sgt Ellis, Acton, Martin, B.Q.M.S. Daney, Naval Base Singapore 1941 Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)

  physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a group of four men in military uniform
 standing on the patio steps of a house. They are all wearing collared shirts with rolled up sleeves
 and mid-lengthed shorts. The photograph is slightly creased and folded on the top-left corner.

  sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony
 this collection is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.title_text: Sgt Ellis, Acton, Martin, B.Q.M.S. Daney, Naval Base Singapore 1941 Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a group of four men in military uniform, standing on the patio steps of a house. They are all wearing collared shirts with rolled up sleeves, and mid-lengthed shorts. The photograph is slightly creased and folded on the top-left corner.
metadata.subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Photography Portraits, Group Singapore Naval Base Soldiers

metadata.sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
